group_1.narration: —Hikaru—@(This manga...I'm getting tired with this, as the@development is meh, and the ending must be as expected.)
—Hikaru—@(I'm even getting tired with these chips...@Nothing lasts with me really...)

group_1.textCenter: For real, I can't do anything...
It's a holiday, so I should at least get out of@my room...

group_1.textLeft: It's been about 3 years since you started playing@lacrosse right?
Amazing that it's the first time you lasted this long.
Yeah, really great.
Well, it can't be helped if Hikaru says so!
Yes, that's right!
Soon Hikaru will find something to get passionate@about.

group_1.textCenter: I feel awkward...@Now that smile is, hurting me.
Pull yourself together, Hikaru.@You should find something to get passionate about...

group_1.textLeft: What's this creature...?@How did you get in here...?
Kyu...bey...@[chara:102201:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:102201:motion_200][chara:102201:lipSynch_1]And this thing is talking!!
A human being, sees this kind of illusion when@feeling really down.

group_1.textRight: I exist in reality, and I am talking to Hikaru Kirari.

group_1.textLeft: ...You must be...kidding...?
...Say you're right, but why did you come to me?

group_1.textRight: Because I am able to solve your problem@immediately.

group_1.textLeft: How are you going to solve it?

group_1.textRight: It's simple but on one condition.

group_1.textLeft: One condition...?

group_1.textRight: Right, make a contract with me and become@a Magical Girl.
With that, I can grant you a wish.

group_1.textLeft: A wish...
That means, you can only grant me a single wish,@right?

group_1.textRight: That is right.@I am afraid it's only one.

group_1.textLeft: ...Now that you said that I can't decide.

group_1.textRight: Of course, you don't have to decide right now.
You better make a decision until then.

group_1.narration: After that,@nothing really happened for several days.
The kindness of my parents@as they treated me the same as always@was really painful.
The frustration@from being unable to find something to get into@and feeling sorry for my parents@have only been accumulated, but still,@I can't change myself...
Perhaps Hikaru will be like this@for the rest of her life...?
I was being obsessed with such thoughts before I knew it,@and just when I almost forgot about that strange creature...

group_1.textLeft: I don't want to disappoint my parents anymore.
Hikaru also doesn't want to be like this forever.
So Kyubey...
Give Hikaru something to get passionate about!
